mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col HW Crothers Wheeling Nov 30 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 30 1861. Please see that Mr. Playford be immediately commissioned if such is the pleasure of his Excellency he cannot give receipt for anything without commission. He is the choice of the whole regiment. H Anisansel Col 1st V.C. Comdg Post 33D104paid
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anisansel, Henry
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Crothers, H. W.
